_metadata.title: Safety Margins for HDPE Pipe Nesting
_metadata.description: Gap clearance formula and safety limits per specification section 3.1

gap_clearance.description: 15mm base + 1.5% of outer diameter for manipulation and ovality

ovality_adjustment.description: Reduces effective inner diameter by 4% for transport/storage deformation

nesting_limits.reason: Beyond 3-4 levels: stability issues and exponentially slower loading/unloading

extraction_warnings.warning_message: Atenție: Necesită echipament greu pentru extragere
extraction_warnings.description: Inner pipe should not be >2x heavier than outer to prevent structural damage

stacking_limits.description: SDR 26 pipes are more susceptible to ovalization under stack weight
